Uses of Class
java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool

  • Packages that use ForkJoinPool  
    软件包 描述
    java.util.concurrent
    在并发编程中常用的实用类。

    • Uses of ForkJoinPool in java.util.concurrent

      Methods in java.util.concurrent that return ForkJoinPool  
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ForkJoinPool ForkJoinPool.commonPool()
      返回公用池实例。
      static ForkJoinPool ForkJoinTask.getPool()
      返回当前任务执行托管池，或null，如果这项任务执行的任何forkjoinpool外。
      ForkJoinPool ForkJoinWorkerThread.getPool()
      返回托管该线程的池。
      Methods in java.util.concurrent with parameters of type ForkJoinPool  
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ForkJoinWorkerThread ForkJoinPool.ForkJoinWorkerThreadFactory.newThread(ForkJoinPool pool)
      返回给定池中的一个新的工作线程。
      Constructors in java.util.concurrent with parameters of type ForkJoinPool  
      Constructor and Description
      ForkJoinWorkerThread(ForkJoinPool pool)
      创建一个forkjoinworkerthread在给定池操作。
